Taumesina Hideaway is a family owned business.  We are tucked away in a very quiet and isolated area  and you think you are far away but not knowing you are still stay close to town.  
Taumesina Hideaway is the only beach fales in town. And we can honestly said that THE only beach fale operator that provides fan, a decent mattress and a healthy continental breakfast for your stay. The delicious continental breakfast includes toast with jam, fried eggs, omelettes and a selection of fresh fruit.  Fresh juice, coffee and tea are also available.
